sentences.sContent: ...I have been out of touch with him since our first reunion after graduation...

remMethod.val: re(重新) ＋ union(联合) → 重聚

trans.tranCn: 重聚， 团聚； 聚会， 联谊活动
trans.tranOther: a social meeting of people who have not met for a long time, especially people who were at school or college together
